message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a steal! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000.
I understand you're on a budget, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $16000 to make it worth my while.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $14500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product.
